name: poison-heal

effect.black-white: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.
effect.black-2-white-2: Poison still damages the Pokémon outside of battle.

short_effect: Heals for 1/8 max HP after each turn when poisoned in place of damage.

flavor_text.black-white: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
